column4: Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col.4)
column5: Cases Sent for Trial during the Year (Col.5)
column6: Total Cases for Trial during the Year (Col.6) = (Col.4+5)
column7: Number of Cases withdrawn by the Govt. (Col.7)
column8: Number of Cases Disposed by Plea Bargaining (Col.8)
column10: Cases in which Trials were Completed (Col.10) = (Col. 11+12)
column14: Cases Pending Trial at the End of the Year (Col.14) = (Col.6 - Col.13)
